title: Farwood Bar and Grill
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fine dining establishment offering vegan choices for brunch, lunch, and dinner upon request. Menu changes regularly. Serves mostly green salad, Thai salad (not including vegan chicken), Farwood burger with either a Boca burger or portobello mushroom and vegan cheese, pasta dish, and a portobello steak. Restaurant is situated in a building reportedly built in 1916 as a gentlemen's bar. Inside is a beautifully carved oak bar that was made in England. For vegan or vegetarian meals it's best to let them know ahead of time, they can put together a special menu. Large groups welcome.
